case.title: SAF wants to meet a nice young SWM - 45
case.text:
I am an attractive woman myself and I am looking for a nice young looking man , one who likes to have fun,go out, laugh, try new things and is pretty much laid back. A guy who is sweet, sincere, honest,loving and having common sense. I have a full time job so it will be better to see a person who is professional. We can exchange many subjects.
Please send your picture because there are many fakes and spams there I heard.
Thank you.
